heroes.add("Jaimie Mantzel");

27 Nov 2008
Always looking for new ideas for things to create, I was recently pointed to the "Giant Robot project" of Jaimie Mantzel. Besides the giant robot he's creating, he also works on a lot of other cool things.

He seems to keep some kind of video blog on YouTube. All of those videos are interesting, unfortunately they are out of order.

Here they are, *in* order:
2007-04-24My newest robot invention... Spider Tank http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=FpOwONezb3c
2007-04-25My dog... the robot http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=GgnAIPEQ9YQ
2007-05-05wall climber... and youtube doesn't like the format http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=VS-1aVhumUI
2007-05-08Snotty.... a Jaimie-mation http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=bPN_E4PKn1c
